name: Custom Graph
description:
Custom Graph lets you build line, bar and cumulative graphs based on your design elements.


HOW TO BUILD A GRAPH:

  1. Select the frame in which you want to build the chart;
  2. Select an object in your design from which you want to build a graph;
  3. Enter data into the table (also supported in pasting from Excel and generating random numbers in the desired range).


FOLLOW THE LINK TO SEE ALL THE SETTINGS:

How to use the plug-in

Demo video with examples


Note: This plugin does not create coordinate axes to give maximum flexibility in plotting. You need to create coordinate axes yourself.
